hadiths.english_translation: He has companionship (with the Prophet ﷺ). He settled in Basra. Said to me 'Ayyash: Abd al-A'la narrated to us, saying al-Jurairi narrated from Abu Nadrah, who said: I was in Sistan when I met Braidah al-Aslami and sat with him.

hadiths.english_translation: He heard from Abdullah ibn Shaqiq and Abu al-Jawza. Amr ibn Ali told me: He died in the year 130 AH. Shu'bah and Hammad ibn Zayd narrated from him. Sulayman ibn Harb told us, saying: Hammad ibn Zayd narrated to us, saying: Budail and Abdullah al-Rumi died on the same day, so Ayyub was called to wash them but remained silent, then said...
